metaTitle: MYKONOS APARTMENTS Dolores | From €259,900 | New Bungalows
metaDescription: Discover MYKONOS APARTMENTS in Dolores, Alicante. 3-bed bungalows from €259,900. Modern living, beach proximity, international community. Delivery 2026.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to MYKONOS APARTMENTS, an exceptional residential development by GRUPO VERMELL in the heart of Sector 3, Dolores. These stunning 3-bedroom bungalows represent a rare opportunity to own a modern, quality home on Spain's vibrant Costa Blanca at prices 40% below comparable island markets. Starting from just €259,900, each property features 76-90m² of thoughtfully designed living space with premium finishes and comprehensive amenities. Scheduled for completion on September 1st, 2026, MYKONOS APARTMENTS combines contemporary comfort with an established international community where English is widely spoken. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, holiday retreat, or investment property with strong 8% year-on-year appreciation potential, this development offers exceptional value. Multiple Blue Flag beaches lie just 20 minutes away, while championship golf courses and world-class healthcare facilities are equally accessible. GRUPO VERMELL's proven track record and 10-year structural warranty ensure peace of mind for your investment in one of Spain's most desirable regions.

locationSection.intro: Sector 3 in Dolores represents one of the Costa Blanca's most sought-after neighborhoods, offering the perfect balance between rural tranquility and modern convenience. This thriving area has become increasingly popular with international buyers seeking authentic Spanish living without sacrificing accessibility to essential services and leisure activities. The neighborhood benefits from its strategic location within the Alicante province, providing easy connections to both the Mediterranean coast and the broader region. Dolores has cultivated a welcoming, English-speaking expat community that enhances quality of life through shared services and social networks. The area's excellent infrastructure includes major supermarkets including Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum, ensuring daily shopping needs are effortlessly met. Healthcare is easily accessible with a regional hospital just 30 minutes away, complemented by private clinics staffed with English-speaking doctors. The surrounding region is renowned for its outdoor lifestyle, featuring several championship golf courses, multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, and an array of restaurants and entertainment venues that cater to diverse tastes.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Schools: International schools with British curriculum available
Community: Established international expat community, English widely spoken
Transport: Bus connections available, car recommended for flexibility

propertyFeatures.intro: MYKONOS APARTMENTS exemplifies contemporary Spanish coastal architecture combined with modern European standards. Each bungalow is constructed with premium materials and rigorous quality control under GRUPO VERMELL's proven development standards. The properties feature energy-efficient design with double glazing and thermal break technology to reduce utility costs year-round. Modern open-plan living spaces maximize natural light and create flexible family environments. All properties include air conditioning pre-installation systems for ultimate climate control comfort. The kitchens arrive fully fitted with quality appliances, eliminating costly post-purchase upgrades. Every unit benefits from private parking spaces and additional storage rooms for convenience.
features: Double glazing with thermal break technology

content.investmentSection: MYKONOS APARTMENTS represents a compelling investment opportunity in one of Europe's fastest-growing real estate markets. Dolores has experienced consistent property appreciation of 8% year-on-year, significantly outpacing inflation and delivering strong portfolio returns. Properties at MYKONOS APARTMENTS are priced 40% below comparable developments on Spanish islands like Mallorca and Ibiza, offering exceptional value for international buyers. The rental market remains robust, with 7-night holiday lets commanding €800 per week—attractive returns for investors seeking passive income streams. The average price per square meter in the area stands at €2,200/m², providing excellent entry-level value for long-term capital appreciation. The established international community ensures consistent demand from both owner-occupants and holiday renters. GRUPO VERMELL's reputation and the development's strategic location near beaches, golf, and amenities make MYKONOS APARTMENTS an ideal choice for investors seeking both lifestyle benefits and financial returns.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in MYKONOS APARTMENTS?
faqs.answer: MYKONOS APARTMENTS is priced from €259,900 for 3-bedroom bungalows with 76-90m² of living space. This represents exceptional value, being 40% less expensive than comparable developments on Spanish islands. Contact our sales team for current availability and detailed pricing information for specific units.

faqs.question: When will MYKONOS APARTMENTS be completed?
faqs.answer: The development is scheduled for completion on September 1st, 2026. GRUPO VERMELL provides a comprehensive 10-year structural warranty on all properties. We can provide detailed delivery schedules and occupation timelines based on construction progress for each unit.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of MYKONOS APARTMENTS?
faqs.answer: GRUPO VERMELL is the developer, with an established track record of delivering quality residential developments throughout Dolores and the surrounding Alicante region. They are committed to high construction standards, customer satisfaction, and professional project management.

faqs.question: Is Costa Blanca a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Costa Blanca offers excellent value, diverse lifestyle options, and strong investment fundamentals. The region benefits from year-round Mediterranean climate, established international communities where English is widely spoken, quality healthcare facilities, outstanding beaches, and championship golf courses. Property values have appreciated 8% year-on-year, supporting long-term investment returns.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. Non-residents can buy real estate provided they obtain a Spanish tax identification number (NIE). We provide comprehensive guidance on all legal requirements, paperwork, and financial documentation needed for international buyers. Our team assists with the entire purchasing process.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, typical costs include transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (0.5-1%), property registration fees (approximately 0.1%), and legal fees (1-3%). Mortgage-related costs and ongoing property taxes (IBI) average 0.4-1.1% of property value annually. We provide detailed cost breakdowns for all MYKONOS APARTMENTS transactions.

faqs.question: How far is MYKONOS APARTMENTS from the beach?
faqs.answer: Multiple Blue Flag beaches are within 20 minutes of MYKONOS APARTMENTS. The strategic location in Sector 3 provides easy access to pristine Mediterranean coastline while maintaining proximity to shopping, healthcare, and entertainment facilities. You can enjoy beach activities regularly without sacrificing access to essential services.

faqs.question: What amenities are near MYKONOS APARTMENTS?
faqs.answer: Extensive nearby amenities include Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets for shopping; a regional hospital within 30 minutes with English-speaking doctors; several championship golf courses; multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes; international schools with British curriculum; and an established English-speaking expat community. Bus connections are available with car rental recommended for optimal flexibility.

faqs.question: What is the rental income potential for MYKONOS APARTMENTS?
faqs.answer: Properties at MYKONOS APARTMENTS achieve strong rental returns, with 7-night holiday lets commanding approximately €800 per week. This generates annual rental income potential of €41,600, representing exceptional yields for investors. The established international tourism market in the region supports consistent occupancy throughout the year.

faqs.question: Do I need a visa to buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Property ownership does not require a Spanish visa; however, residency regulations vary by nationality. EU/EEA citizens have unrestricted residency rights. Non-EU citizens can apply for various visa categories including the investor visa for property purchases exceeding €500,000. Our legal team provides comprehensive guidance on visa and residency options for international buyers.

content.conclusion: MYKONOS APARTMENTS represents a unique opportunity to invest in a premium Costa Blanca development at unbeatable prices. GRUPO VERMELL's commitment to quality, combined with the development's strategic location, modern amenities, and strong investment fundamentals, makes this an exceptional choice for homebuyers and investors alike. With completion scheduled for September 2026, now is the ideal time to secure your property while inventory remains available. The established international community, proximity to beaches and golf courses, excellent healthcare and educational facilities, and 40% value advantage over island markets make MYKONOS APARTMENTS an outstanding investment for your Spanish property portfolio. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, holiday home, or rental investment, this development delivers comprehensive lifestyle benefits and financial returns. Contact our team today via WhatsApp for personalized property consultations, detailed floor plans, pricing information, and assistance throughout your purchasing journey. Don't miss this opportunity to own a beautiful home in one of Spain's most desirable regions.
